title: Exploring PHP MVC Best Practices
content: Today I learned how to structure a PHP MVC project properly. Controllers should only handle logic and Views should only render HTML.

title: Top 10 JavaScript Tricks
content: JavaScript is full of hidden gems. Here are some tricks that can make your code cleaner and faster.

title: My First MongoDB Aggregation
content: Aggregations in MongoDB allow you to process data in powerful ways. I created a pipeline that counts likes and comments.

title: Understanding Async/Await in JS
content: Async/await simplifies asynchronous JavaScript code. Here's a guide on how to use it correctly.

title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox
content: Flexbox is great for one-dimensional layouts while Grid shines in 2D layouts. Learn when to use each.

title: Building REST APIs with PHP
content: REST APIs are essential for modern applications. Here's how to structure endpoints and controllers.

title: Node.js Event Loop Explained
content: The event loop in Node.js is the heart of its asynchronous behavior. Understanding it is crucial for performance.

title: Introduction to GraphQL
content: GraphQL offers flexible querying for APIs. This post covers basics, queries, and mutations.

title: Responsive Web Design Tips
content: Learn how to make websites look great on any device using media queries and flexible layouts.

title: My Experience with Vue.js
content: Vue.js is a progressive frontend framework. I built a small project and learned about reactive data binding.

title: React Hooks Deep Dive
content: Hooks allow functional components in React to manage state and side-effects. Here’s a detailed explanation.

title: Introduction to Docker
content: Docker simplifies deployment by containerizing applications. I learned how to build and run containers locally.

title: Kubernetes Basics
content: Kubernetes orchestrates containers at scale. This post introduces pods, services, and deployments.

title: Getting Started with Tailwind CSS
content: Tailwind is a utility-first CSS framework. I built a few components and enjoyed the rapid prototyping.

title: Understanding REST vs GraphQL
content: REST and GraphQL are different API approaches. This post compares their pros and cons.

title: Forum Announcement: New Features!
content: We’ve added new features to improve your experience. Check them out in the dashboard!

title: Site Maintenance Scheduled
content: Our servers will be down for maintenance on Saturday from 2 AM to 5 AM UTC.

title: Feedback: Forum UI Improvements
content: We want your feedback on the new forum layout. Let us know what you think!

title: Feedback: Mobile App Suggestions
content: Share your suggestions for improving our mobile app. We read every comment!

title: Community Guidelines Update
content: We updated our community guidelines to make the forum safer for everyone. Please read them carefully.
